General.Name: ARCUS DEVELOPMENT
General.Description: Arcus Development Group Inc. engages in the acquisition and exploration of mineral properties in Canada. The company primarily explores for gold, copper, and sliver deposits. It holds a 100% interest in the Touleary property located in the White Gold District of Yukon Territory. The company was incorporated in 2006 and is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 905 West Pender Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6C 1L6
